summary: A collection of command‑line tools that translate pretrained language model checkpoints and tokenizers between HuggingFace Transformers format and NVIDIA NeMo (Megatron‑GPT/Megatron‑Core) format for a wide range of architectures, handling configuration adaptation, weight renaming, precision and parallelism settings, and producing .nemo archives or HuggingFace model directories.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless migration of models across the HuggingFace and NeMo ecosystems, allowing developers and researchers to reuse existing checkpoints, integrate them into NeMo‑based training or inference pipelines, and share models between communities without manual re‑implementation.
